name: bouncy-ball
description: Compares web animation techniques by bouncing a ball with each one.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: postcss --use stylelint --use postcss-import --postcss-import.path 'node_modules/prismjs/themes' --use postcss-cssnext --use postcss-reporter -o site/assets/styles.css site/css/*.css
scripts.watch: postcss --watch --use stylelint --use postcss-import --postcss-import.path 'node_modules/prismjs/themes' --use postcss-cssnext --use postcss-reporter -o site/assets/styles.css site/css/*.css

author: Bryan Braun
